sentences.en: Crying can be a great stress reliever.
sentences.cn: 哭是一种很好的减压方式.

sentences.en: I think I can take most medicine except for strong pain reliever.
sentences.cn: 除了止痛片以外大多数药我都可以服用.

sentences.en: In the meantime, Igawa will remain available for the Yankees as a reliever.
sentences.cn: 同时, 井川庆仍然可作为洋基的中继投手.

sentences.en: Other medicines are also available - include long - acting reliever and preventer tablets.
sentences.cn: 还有一些其他的 长效 的缓解类和预防类药物的片剂.

sentences.en: Take your usual dose of reliever inhaler before going out on cold, dry days.
sentences.cn: 在干冷的天气外出前,首先现带上平时剂量的哮喘药物.

sentences.en: The doctor prescribed a pain reliever.
Your child should take a dose of reliever inhaler when they start having asthma symptoms.
sentences.cn: 当孩子哮喘开始发作时,需要及时施用这种缓解类用药.
